title: Stark Pleasure; the Space Magnate's Mistress
description: Can she survive the perils of the galaxy on her wits ... or will she have to use her body? Kiri te Nawa will do anything to escape the perilous streets of New Seattle, Earth II and find the treasure for which she searches the galaxy. She'll even become the mistress of space magnate Logan Stark. But just when she's ready to submit more than her body to this powerful, magnetic man, she's kidnapped into her darkest nightmare, deep space.Will he search for her, or believe she's betrayed him with an old lover? Book 1 of 4 Set in the futuristic galaxy of the best-selling Orion Series.
author: Cathryn Cade
